text: The women's 1500 metres event at the 1982 Commonwealth Games was held on 8 and 9 October at the QE II Stadium in Brisbane, Australia. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:left" |- align="center" | width=200 bgcolor=gold|Gold||width=200 bgcolor=silver|Silver|| width=200 bgcolor=CC9966|Bronze |- |Christina Boxer '''' |Gillian Dainty '''' |Lorraine Moller '''' |} ==Results== ===Heats=== Qualification: First 4 in each heat (Q) and the next 2 fastest (q) qualify for the semifinals. {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !!
